title: Ticket #1642: starter hangs when glexec linger=true
description:
When the glexec linger option is turned on, condor_starter hangs in feed_wrapper() while waiting for the pipe to the wrapper to close. When we observed this, the wrapper was no longer running. The user job was running, indicating that the wrapper must have successfully exec'ed the job. But the wrapper sets the FD_CLOEXEC flag on its end of the pipe, so the job should not hold the pipe open. So who has the pipe open?

My suspicion is that glexec has the pipe open. However, attaching to glexec with gdb and closing the pipes manually did not cause the starter to get unstuck.

I don't actually know the original version in which this problem exists, so I have put 7.4.0 for now.
